title: Only one hour and 40 minutes power cut  tomorrow: PUCSL
body_lines: The scheduled power cut has been reduced from six hours to one hour and 40 minutes tomorrow (April 3), the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said.
They said the decision to reduce power cut was taken as the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) is being supplied with adequate fuel for power generation.
Accordingly, the areas A. B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W will experience one hour and 40 minutes from 5.30 pm to 10.30 pm, PUCSL said. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
